document_data.name: Ahmahd abd al-Iffa
document_data.mainbody: General '''Ahmahd abd al-Iffa''' directed the [[mamluk]]s of the [[Honored Mamluk Society]] in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Ahmahd was a burly [[eunuch]]. He grew rather soft after going years without seeing real combat.
document_data.Activities: Ahmahd was in charge of the security of the Royal Harim of the [[Grand Caliph]]. He directed a legion of fanatical eunuchs of the Honored mamluk society.{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|21}} He reported to [[Preani Qin]].
document_data.Rumors and Legends: Ahmahd had a weakness for sweets, a fact that many of the Grand Caliph's wives took advantage of if they wanted to sneak men into the harem.
